from.description: Senderid like Elks (3-11 chars a-Z and 0-9 starting with a char), or a 46elks number like +46766861004 or a unlocked from number like your own number +46766861004.

to.description: Number in e164 number like +46766861004 or in local format for AU,CA,DK,FI,IN,NO,SE and US prefix with country code like SE0723175800

message.description: Text to send to the phone.

whendelivered.description: Url to send the Delivery report to

flashsms.description: Do not store message on the phone.

dryrun.description: Do not send the message, get price estimation and verify parameters.

dontlog.description: Do not store data about SMS in the API platform, set to "message" to hide message content.
